articles.title: Antidepressant may prevent severe COVID-19, U.Va. research finds - WTOP
articles.description: The antidepressant fluvoxamine appears to prevent COVID-19 infections from worsening and may help keep patients out of the hospital, a trial based on research from the University of Virginia School of Medicine suggests.

articles.author: Megan Jones
articles.title: Long lines at Aurora coronavirus testing site as COVID-19 cases spike in Illinois - Chicago Tribune
articles.description: Residents are seeing long wait times at the Aurora COVID-19 daily testing site as the number of people looking to get tested surges as coronavirus cases spike in Illinois, officials said.
